sense.def:
To discern something
pomeni nekaj videti, če tisto dobro pogledamo.

seg.quote: I could dimly discern his figure.

sense.def:
To discern something
pomeni tudi nekaj opaziti ali razumeti po temeljitem razmišljanju ali preučevanju.

seg.quote: Posy had not discerned the real reason.
He is unable to discern what is actually happening.
